website_summaries.verdict: Chances are you'll like the Ironman's looks and functions, but comparable models can do what it does at lower price points.
pros: Produces measurements quickly, and can store them in its memory as long as you need them
cons: Screen is somewhat difficult to read, and measurements are sometimes inaccurate

customer_reviews.title: Great information and highly accurate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scale for me. Was interested in the information I received when I had a body analysis done at the Mayo Clinic during a nutritional consultation. They had a Tanita (albeit a much more expensive model), but this scale matched the numbers from my consultation. It's good to see that I may have gained a pound due to added muscle, and the readings are consistent. Highly recommend this scale for both the information you get as well as the accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Good accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: I think it's fairly accurate. Easy to set up, simple instructions. Negatives: you can't bluetooth connect to access and record data; and the displays of each measurement with the exception of weight do not stay on the screen long enough: also the display doesn't light up (just black, so I actually have to bend over to see the other measurements...). I like that it gives a large range of data: weight, body fat, body water, muscle mass, physique rating, BMR, metabolic age, bone mass and visceral fat.
customer_reviews.author: fitmommyat52

customer_reviews.title: We love our Tanita Ironman
customer_reviews.text: We love our Tanita Ironman. Performs exactly as the information states. It's within points of the $5000 Tanita unit I get weighed on bi- weekly at my weight loss center. Extremely happy with my purchase. Now I can monitor my stats for myself and gaurentee success for my future at keeping my fat % under control and my body healthy for ever. This is our second Taniita, the first only monitored weight and BMI. We've had that one for 10 years and it's still accurate but wanted more options and this was the one for us. Thanks for the great product at a great price!! Colleen
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Plute

customer_reviews.title: It only lasted 14 months.
customer_reviews.text: This product only last for 14 months. The scale was kept safe and free from damage. I emailed Tanita about this and they never responded. I bought a much cheaper Renpho scale to replace it and would advise others to do the same. If you pay that much for something, you expect quality to be behind their brand name or at the very least good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Built to last for sure.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is consistently accurate. The scale I had previously would tell you 3 different weights if you stood on it 3 times in a row. The scale is packed full of features and is very easy to setup. I have had it for over 2 years now and it is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works good if you only want a scale
customer_reviews.text: The metabolic age doesn't ever change, even after losing 23 pounds and eating healthy. It stays at 50 for both my husband and I. The weight measurement is off by about .2 pounds but not a big deal. It doesn't save readings from previous days. I wish I would have bought a wireless scale so I don't have to reenter readings into my fitness app.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Reid

customer_reviews.title: It was the best thing I could have given to myself
customer_reviews.text: you can not go wrong with this scale when keeping track of weight progress..It was the best thing I could have given to myself..and so easy to set up..
customer_reviews.author: Reazo

customer_reviews.title: First Tanita Scale
customer_reviews.text: My old scale had to retire... so this is my first tanita scale. I'm pretty impressed with it... the scale has many functions and it will provide you with your BF, MUSCLE, BONE, BMI, ETC. Not sure how accurate the info is but it gives me an idea where my weight and health is at.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi89

customer_reviews.title: Accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: This thing works pretty accurately to me! My BF used to work as a head person at Weight Watchers and these were the only reliable scales they used. It’s spot on. I think the reason why some people think they get inaccurate readings is possibly because they’re measuring themselves different times of the day.
customer_reviews.author: seppy

customer_reviews.title: Accurate enough, but no lighting
customer_reviews.text: seems to be accurate within +/- half a pound. But the display has no backlight. A blue or orange backlight would push this rating up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Nunemaker

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale I Have Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scale I have ever owned. More than just total weight, it indicates muscle mass, bone mass, visceral fat, fat percentage, and fitness indicators. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: andygetch

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: Good scale. Makes weighing yourself interesting. However, after using it several times throughout the day for several days, it does appear that readings are calculated on base lines, instead of actual individual readings. But, overall a very good scale.
customer_reviews.author: van jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scale. Weight appears accurate and it is very easy to use and read the data. I find some variance in the fat % and other measurements, but they overall trend as I expect from my diet/exercise over the time period. I believe the variations are caused by differences in my water intake - how much and when I last drank. I tend to drink a lot of water for my size, due to having kidney stone issues many years ago that went away with upping my water, and have heard that affects these electric impedance devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Scale came and we had one for 10 years, ...
customer_reviews.text: Scale came and we had one for 10 years, and decided to get a new one. It worked about three weeks and started beeping randomly. Once we realized the noise was from the new scale, we changed the batteries. Five hours later it started beeping again. Company said to send it back for replacement. It has not shown up yet, so when I called to check, they said it was being "evaluated" and could not tell us the status. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok for non profesionals
customer_reviews.text: It's has been working OK for now. Its just tha sometimes the accurecy is not the better.
customer_reviews.author: Adriel A

customer_reviews.title: works amazingly well
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 other fat scales from Tanita that didn't owrk at all. Registered me almost doulbe real body fat(i know my level becasue I have been medically tested). Talked to Tanita people who said all there machines are accurate and the " algorithms are all identical. They're wrong. After testing my trainers $500 pro Ironman tanita scale, I got the $80 ironman scale which works extremely well. Buy only the Innerscan ironman scales not the Tanita built ones.!
customer_reviews.author: Bill tyler

customer_reviews.title: Older is wiser
customer_reviews.text: This item is identical to the newer model in specs. All they did in the newer model was change the shape and add $20. This model is square and quite sturdy, while the shape of the newer model looks shaky. If its important for you to have the newest, and possibly not as sturdy model, don't buy this. Since I have all the functions of the new model, an a square solid shape, I'm sticking with this one. In my humble opinion, the BC554 is the safest bet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Picton

customer_reviews.title: Feature Laden Gee Whiz Scale
customer_reviews.text: Being a computer guy, I love all of the features and measures that the scale gives me. And with multiple people in the family, it is nice to have them all have a profile on the scale. The scale's body fat calculation matched my doctor's and the kids school scales, which is good. You need 20/20 vision and a magnifying glass to see the icons and numbers that come out. I wish they would show them in bigger type and slower, to handle the older person. Overall, I am very happy with the scale and the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: P. Horwitz

customer_reviews.title: very glad I got this - working on getting my body ...
customer_reviews.text: very glad I got this - working on getting my body fat down, muscle mass up and this gives me great feedback on my progress. I should perhaps give it 5 stars because it appears that I can get more details from the system but the instructions for so doing are not great. So the 4 stars is related to documentation not being clear vs the machine itself
customer_reviews.author: canine afionado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Even when it tells me things I don't like. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dulcinea

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: A question of accuracy! This scale is the very first I have ever used to actually agree with the measurements taken when I visit the doctor. Even my doctor was impressed with everything this baby could do. Use. You must weigh yourself in your bare feet, otherwise the internal scanner will not work properly. Once it does, look out! Perhaps one of the most important items it tells you is how many calories it takes to maintain your body "AS IS". This then becomes the figure to beat to lose weight. There's one more thing I get a real kick out of... and that is when it tells me I have a metabolism of a person less than my age.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Inner Scan Body Composition Monitor Scale.
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this item. It is made well. There are a lot of key functions that are very helpful in monitoring your weight thus helping to improve your health. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like my stats
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm. I like my stats, but my son, who is in great shape, probably single digit BF reads out as being obese. He's 6', 170 lb, a weight lifter with ripped abs - a 29" waist. Really?
customer_reviews.author: shushu

customer_reviews.title: Very consistent
customer_reviews.text: I paid a little extra for this scale because I wanted one that worked. I'd recently purchased another scale that required damp feet (pretty inconvenient unless you're getting out of the shower) and it didn't even provide accurate results. This one is consistent with my older, non-body composition scale. It beeps to let you know the calculations are ready, and you can scroll through the results in case you missed them. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Love the accuracy. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that I wish it was Bluetooth compatible with the various health apps on my I Phone. I have to stand on the scale, go through all the readings, then jot them down by hand!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Peppelman

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a new, Live the Lifestyle, program I had started. I had bought a different scale but because my hydration level was below 43% the scale did not work. If your hydration was below the 43% all you could read was your weight then you would receive an error. This scale measures hydration at a lower percentage so I could get ALL the readings I needed. Very easy to program and add additional users.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Tanita BC554
customer_reviews.text: Weight, body fat and visceral fat, all quite important, appear to be accurate. Some variation of fat and body compositions dependent on hydration, as stated in easy-to- use manual. As I'm 65 years old, some disappointment that metabolic rate reads only up to 50 years, regardless of possible actual rate over 50. Also, bone density only a relative measurement, not much comparison data given. All told, a useful measuring and motivational tool, easy to set up and use for small or even sizable family. Glad I bought it, though it isn't exactly inexpensive. UPDATE on 2/1/13: Appears to still be working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Varvarigos

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use it often and the measurements are consistent. This makes sense as my lifestyle routines are more or less fixed. I run a fitness program. Satisfied with this as a measurement tool, I now use is to measure our clients' progress.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Matsutaro

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scales
customer_reviews.text: Finally scales that are accurate and don’t change when moved to different locations. Gives you confidence when weighing yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool. The only 'flaw' is the metabolic age ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. The only 'flaw' is the metabolic age only goes to 50 and this wasn't mentioned anywhere that we saw prior to our purchase. Other than that, it's equally good as a much more expensive model- we LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again. Not consistently accurate depending on where ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't buy again. Not consistently accurate depending on where on the floor you place it (flat tiled floors).
customer_reviews.author: M C Greggor

customer_reviews.title: Great scale!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scale that does exactly what is described. Use it daily to track my weight and hydration level. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tsoukalas

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: Good scale. I think the one I received may weigh light based on my weighing in at other locations. But overall it is a good scale but the only thing it doesn't give you is your BMI which I find rather strange for such a high level scale.
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I have used it at home and compared ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I have used it at home and compared it to a much more professional one at my endocrinologist's office and it's nearly spot on for every weigh in. It's important to understand how hydration affects the different measurements so you don't become discouraged or get the wrong impression about your outcome. Being within the hydration range is essential and if you're not, your fat percentage goes up and your muscle (and bone if you're really dehydrated) goes down. The more hydrated you are, the more accurate those two measurements will be, and the more preferable if you're trying to lose fat and gain muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Ironman Body Compostion Scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is a great tool for those people looking to make a change in their lifestyle. Knowing if you drink enough water, have enough muscle or what your bodyfat % is are valuable assets. My whole family loves this scale. I would recommend it to anyone serious about weightloss and their health.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bertone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to set up. Not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: I still have it .it works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy having this product help me to guide me ...to be healthier
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: The body scanner works about 5% of the time, the actual scale stopped working. All it said was 5 pounds amd wouldnt measure anything. I tried to find a flat piece of ground for hours and nothing worked. This $130 purchase is now in the trash. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Tanita
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST scale I have ever had. The accuracy is amazing and actually is showing me to be an entire half pound less than my personal trainers gym, which goes to show you having an accurate scale that is calibrated is priceless!
customer_reviews.author: LisaLou

customer_reviews.title: This scale is a great motivator!
customer_reviews.text: I really have been enjoying this scale! I use it one a week and track trends. So far its been great and I love all the good information it provides. It was a little tricky for me to get the hang of all the different readings, but now I am a pro! I just jot the numbers down on an app on my phone to keep track.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Solar Minimum

customer_reviews.title: Great Bodyfat Scale
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the scale for a few weeks now and it seems to work rather well. I really appreciate the athlete mode because I had an older Tanita body fat scale that would always say I was 22+% body fat which is obviously wrong since I am closer to 15-16% based on appearance. Well this scale seems to get it right and it is easy to set up and looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leitinger

customer_reviews.title: Use the scale everyday or keep you on track
customer_reviews.text: Your weight won't change no matter what scale you use but this one is a quality scale
customer_reviews.author: Glen on the run after all these years

customer_reviews.title: Convient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this over a year ago to mainly monitor my body hydration. The scale "weight" is dead on, As for hydration, I cannot attest to it's accuracy, but use it for relative measurements.. And does so much more. Oh, still on my original set of batteries, or battery. Haven't had to look... lol
customer_reviews.author: David A. Pinniger

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Scale!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scale on a recommendation for a runner friend of ours. We are really quite pleased with it. It's very sleek and modern, doesn't take up too much room and seem to be quite consistent in it's readings. I you're an athlete and looking for a body-fat scale this is probably the best buy out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F

customer_reviews.title: Love it and great seller
customer_reviews.text: Lots of info - thanks for providing a great product to assist in my weight loss. Now I need to learn about the information it provides!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Just wish I had the one that lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to use it with my patients and works perfectly, some time the scan give you a wierd numbers, you have to use it allways without socks.
customer_reviews.author: ALMA T.

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Ironman.
customer_reviews.text: My first ironman BC554 was bought in 2003 and just recently stopped working , it was such a great scale I immediately bought another, and love it.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Health and Weight Loss
customer_reviews.text: This scale is incredible. It is amazing the information you find out about yourself once you have entered the pertinent information. My husband and I are able to keep our weight in check as we precede with our weight loss. An online weight loss program and this scale help you move toward better health in the privacy of your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Diane V Himmelstein

customer_reviews.title: Provides all the info I need including BMR to monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: Provides all the info I need including BMR to monitor my weight loss progress and caloric needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tobes

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of this scale. I was in a weight loss challenge through my running store and the nutritionist recommended using something like this scale since I couldn't keep going to see her and I wanted to continue on in my quest to become a healthier me. This scale reminds me that it's not just the number of the pounds that make a healthy me, it's the rest of the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: JErwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that i can track all these different body measurements!! it is easy to use and functions great!
customer_reviews.author: Helena Welch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and does everything it claimed. i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bill weathersby

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale
customer_reviews.text: In my son's sport it is important to have an accurate scale. This is the second one we have purchased. Our first one lasted 8 years. This scale is 100% accurate. We don not use all the features on this scale just the weight and like I said it is dead on everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Bodyfat scale
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as advertised. This is my second one. My ex stole my last one so, I just ordered another. I love to track all my body composition data, especially - Bodyfat!
customer_reviews.author: Bob. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Still working well after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I've had scale for over 3 years and it is still reliable and consistent. It gets 5 stars for passing test of time
customer_reviews.author: A. Quiroga

customer_reviews.title: I'm afraid of getting on it every morning because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid of getting on it every morning because I know I'll be confronted with accurate readings every time. Scary.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my husband had tried one and discovered he was very dehydrated. I love how simple it is to use. We have been tracking our progress over the last month. The information on it is all great to know.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Tooth

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this scale after extensive research. We found it to be a great benefit to any lifestyle plan.
customer_reviews.author: texan

customer_reviews.title: good gauge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meter for my routine check of my parameters during weight loss, remains amazed at how quick and easy it gives the results, it is a fantastic device
customer_reviews.author: maria milano

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Is the worst scale that i ever buy... Just work one day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, easy to use. Very happy with this scale. Lots of bells and whistles. Make sure you need all, if not just purchase a Tanita that has BW, Body Fat %, ,and Body water %.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leistner

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: I love the scale. It was recommended to me by a trainer at the gym and she was right. It was the best buy of these scales for the money and it really helps to give me that extra push. It helps me to determine all aspects of my weight, not just overall weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Health Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this monitor for the last 5 years with great results. Only criticism would be the screen is a little fragile, don't bump too hard or it breaks the screen. I have broken two before I replaced with this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sybarite

customer_reviews.title: easy, accurate, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set-up. It has the ability to assess athletic composition. In the group that tested it on Guest Mode, the people we knew were in lousy shape registered that way on the scale. It also shipped sooner and arrived sooner than we thought it would. It's a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Herrick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The body fat percentage is not accurate at all (off by 7% body fat).
customer_reviews.author: Quinnie

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Informative
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and extremely informative beyond a regular weight scale!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne D. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a personal trainer it is an amazing tool which I use to help track my client's progress. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quality scale but might be more than I need day to day.
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: More than a year using it and I love it. The top body age is 50 years old!! So, do not feel happy if you are older than that and it says you are like a body of 50...
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: Used it for over two years. LCD stopped working , they replaced it free of charge. Accurate. A bit heavy. The newer models looks better and have more functions. Very Pleased
customer_reviews.author: FairIsFair

customer_reviews.title: TOP # 1 Body Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a exelent product to help scan your body. Really easy to use and im sure is 99.99% that is accurate I recomended to my familly and i get to use it at work to provided health improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: I am an addict
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife, and I use it more than her. I started weight lifting and it has really helped to see my progress.
customer_reviews.author: danny strong

customer_reviews.title: Tanita BC5454 Ironman Glass InnerScan Body Composition Monitor Elite Series
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with the Tanita BC5454 Ironman Glass InnerScan Body Composition Monitor Elite Series Scales ..highly recommended with prompt service and no damage
customer_reviews.author: Laura Niles

customer_reviews.title: not that acurate
customer_reviews.text: Weights seems accurate but % of body fat is not
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Oakland

customer_reviews.title: Ironman scale
customer_reviews.text: Had been seeing this scale in Runners World for some time - looked it up and found Amazon had AND for 1/2 the price of Road Runners Magazine. Very accurate and easy to use. It is also a "pretty" piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Castille

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale, Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is a very accurate scale I would highly recommend! It is better than your average scale and shows great detail about your fitness level and health.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Falkenberg

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is perfect for the use I needed it for. I have used scales that cost $400 and I liked this much better. Easy to use and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Hunsicker

customer_reviews.title: Ironman Body Composition Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for ongoing fitness monitoring. Easy to use. A feature for weekly and monthly averages of the parameters would be useful. The scale's price is inexpensive for the level of information it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Hommer

customer_reviews.title: Some reading vary a lot
customer_reviews.text: weight reading is very precise, others like %fat, %water, muscle mass, vary a lot, including readings made on the same day
customer_reviews.author: JOAO CAETANO MAGALHAES

customer_reviews.title: Body Composition Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Quite Happy with the scale, but it is true you need to take the readings at the same time everyday or week. YOu can be out by 3% if not. I find it very useful for Ironman training as you can monitor the changes in your body during training.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Guy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. Absolutely love all the information it gives you about yourself. I can see anyone improving their health, fitness and conditioning by purchasing one of these scales.
customer_reviews.author: Zim

customer_reviews.title: Paints a pretty picture!
customer_reviews.text: Gives you a precise picture of your body composition. Makes it simple to track progress and takes all the guessing out of weight maintenance programs.
customer_reviews.author: Zippypc

customer_reviews.title: Yes I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I think the readings are pretty accurate since when I got it I was in excellent shape and the scale showed it and now, about 3-4 years later, I'm not in such great shape and the indicators show it as well... At least it keeps me aware of my condition.
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic step up from the prior Tanita scale I had. Well worth the extra few dollars? A+ fitness product...!!!
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyÂ Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Is a good price and great product . Is perfect for personal management weit simple and easy to understand to read
customer_reviews.author: Nisuc

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now and it is still the one I would choose to get again. Very good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Tanita BC554
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, the product is great. However, the Profile 1 button stopped working within a week of recieving. I contacted Amazon, who tells me they can't replace the item because they no longer have a supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Tanita BC554 Scale
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best investments I have ever made. It makes weight maintenece fun and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Happygolucky

customer_reviews.title: Bodyfat measurement is ~30% off.
customer_reviews.text: Received this scale today since I'm mainly interested in tracking my bodyfat. I had a BOD POD scan done the day prior so I had a good baseline of what my bodyfat truly was. If I'm to believe this scale, I've lost 3.2% bodyfat in 28 hours. That is pretty amazing... I have a cheaper Healthline scale that only does bodyfat to the percentage and that $50 scale is more accurate than this $150 scale.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R.

customer_reviews.title: Scale is quite heavy. Difficult to keep clean because ...
customer_reviews.text: Scale is quite heavy. Difficult to keep clean because of the construction of the glass to the plastic housing.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: It's early to tell..
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the scale that long but I do believe it is accurate for weight-at least. I think there is value at comparing yourself in the various areas frequently even if the numbers aren't 100%. You at least know if you are consistant, improving or losing ground. It does track multiple users. I'm not gifted in electronics and found it confusing to set up.
customer_reviews.author: psam

customer_reviews.title: Looks good...works well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the scale at the start of the year. Arrived in Honolulu within days which is impressive. Scale has many features, many of them you will probably not use unless you are a hard core athlete. I basically use the weight and fat percentage which seems very consistent for tracking progress. Good value for the price and I have reccommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: DKT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scale.  It will be honest with you
customer_reviews.text: I have had bathroom scales, but nothing quiet like this one. It lets me keep a very good track of all my health (excl BP HR. You will really like this. Good for 5 ppl settings and guests. Enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! with a lot of information to track your performance. Good deal regarding price vs. quality. The only thing I will change will be the design, I would prefer other material insteal crystal.
customer_reviews.author: ROSEMARY RODRIGUEZ BADILLA

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Lots of functions and amazon had the very best price! Quick delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Gierer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: whats not to like? Works as advertised. okay the price is a little steep!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Time

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Scale
customer_reviews.text: Works fine - of course the database is averages so use with a grain of salt.
customer_reviews.author: N. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Tanita BC554
customer_reviews.text: It tells you everything you need to work on in order for you to have a healthy diet. I would recommend to anyone who wants a better healthy life style.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Collado

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with my Tanita scale because it measures so many more features than any normal scale! I can see if I am losing body fat vs just looking to lose actual weight.
customer_reviews.author: mkyvonne

product_meta.title: Tanita BC554 Ironman Glass InnerScan Body Composition Monitor Elite Series
product_meta.description:
From Tanita, The Body Fat Experts, comes the BC 554 Ironman Innerscan Body Composition Monitor. This scale is a unique and highly accurate body composition monitor. This product not only measures weight and body fat, it also tells you your muscle mass, body water %, basal metabolic rate (BMR), metabolic age, bone mass, visceral fat and rates your physique! The muscle mass feature indicates the weight of muscle in the body. The Body Water % is the total amount of fluid in the body expressed as a percentage of total weight. The BMR is the daily minimum level of energy or calories your body requires when resting (including sleeping) to function effectively. The Metabolic Age compares your BMR to the average age associated with that level of metabolism. The Bone Mass is the weight of your bone in your body. The Visceral Fat is the fat in the abdominal cavity (stomach), surrounding the vital organs. The Physique Rating is a rating of your body type; 1-9. Its sleek, modern design of glass and silver accents is a compliment to any bathroom. Monitor your health and fitness with an Ironman Body Composition Monitor.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Tanita BC554 Ironman Glass InnerScan Body Composition Monitor Elite Series is one of the most comprehensive body monitors on the market today that's designed for home use. Using advanced Bioelectric Impedance Analysis (BIA) technology that was previously available only to medical professionals, health clubs and professional athletes, this monitor analyzes a full range of body measurements, including weight, body fat percentage, body water percentage, metabolic age, bone mass, and physique rating. It's a mouthful of measurements, but what it means is that with the Tanita BC554, you now have the unprecedented ability to monitor your body and the effects of your diet and fitness routines, comfortably and affordably in the convenience of your own home.

 


Monitoring features help you keep tabs on your body composition and health. View larger. 

There is more to healthy dieting than weight loss alone. Body fat percentage measurements are also important indicators of good health. View larger. 

The Tanita BC554 Ironman delivers advanced body monitoring technology with a sleek, stylish design. View larger. With the Tanita BC554, up to four users can benefit. Simply supply your gender, age, height and weight in the memory, step on the scale, and the monitor does the rest. The results are analyzed according to each user's information, and the result -- displayed in the monitor's 2.25-inch LCD screen -- is the one of the most comprehensive at-home readings you can get. This monitor, which is about the same size as a typical bathroom scale, is ideal for anyone who is serious about monitoring their health and fitness. Knowing your body fat percentage -- the amount of body fat as a proportion of your body weight -- is essential if you want to create a diet and exercise plan that helps reduce the risk of certain conditions such as high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes and cancer. Body water percentage is the total amount of fluid in your body expressed as a percentage of your total weight. Maintaining a healthy body water percentage ensures that your body functions efficiently. The metabolic age level is related to your body's metabolic rate and helps you maintain the daily minimum level of energy or calories your body requires when resting or sleeping to function effectively. Even though your total body weight might not change drastically over time, your muscle mass and body fat levels may be changing. Keeping tabs on them can help you stay at a lower risk of certain diseases. As you become more active and reduce the amount of body fat, your physique rating will also change accordingly. The physique rating helps you maintain a diet and fitness program to achieve your desired level. And knowing your levels of visceral fat -- the fat in the abdominal cavity and surrounding the vital organs -- can help you keep heart disease and high blood pressure at bay, and may delay the onset of type two diabetes. In short, this monitor gives you essential information and greater control as you work to stay healthy and live a more active, vital life.

 Operating on four AA batteries (included), the Tanita BC554 is intended for use by persons up to 330 pounds and is backed by Tanita's 3-year warranty. 

 
Note: Pregnant women should not use this monitor, and if you have a pacemaker or other internal electronic medical device, you should not use the body fat reading feature.
feature_bullets: Uses Tanita exclusive FDA cleared bioelectric impedance
Analysis, trusted by health and fitness experts around the world since 1992
User-friendly, your personal information is stored in one of four permanent memory locations, step on the scale and your results are displayed in under 20 seconds.
Large tempered glass and stainless steel platform supports a weight up to 330 lbs with 0.2 lb accuracy, comes with 4 AA batteries and is backed by a 3 year warranty.
